title: Big Plays Spotlight: Xpecial sets up the penta

replies.body: Well, I would call that result for TSM... KARMA ;D
Get out.
no that was good, stay in!
That's what she said.{{champion:48}}
That was {{champion:154}}tually pretty good
*wa{{champion:154}}tually
I liked it...
Xellent plays.
Hail Hydra.
On your left.
Such a good movie!
Get out, damn spammer. You are one of the few ppl who ruin the internet.
HA "few"
These big plays aren't all that big...
{{champion:36}} Is displeased with your statement.
{{champion:36}} Posts where he pleases
{{champion:36}} Throw cleaver good. {{champion:36}} sets up penta for teammates
Actually I'm {{champion:36}}  and I approve this message.
You're totally right! A pentakill to end the game? that happens pretty much every couple minutes
in the LCS, pentas are extremely rare(depending on teams) and are a big deal because they are done with style.
Dude... Sarcasm
Woosh
Supports win games guys. never talk shit to your support. they might just screw you over
I'm not one for feeding, but if my carry feeds and my team blames me, I'll open the buffet.
Comment is below {{champion:412}}hold (show)
Actually tried to click it ... u made me feel stoopid
stupid* (grammer nazi here to save the day)
Awkward when you spelled grammar* wrong......
{{champion:43}} HADOOOOKEN!
Bitch, I'm the only Hadoken around here. {{champion:63}}
hers is more like a Kamamehameha
*{{champion:43}} mehamaeha you mean...
{{champion:64}} HELL NO
But he didn't get anyone with the box...
No, but it zoned CLG (specifically Jax) from diving to the backline for those few crucial seconds. If you watch closely, right after The Box drops, Jax moves up, then backs away from it.
I'll point out the elephant in the room.  {{champion:236}} laned with {{champion:412}} ? k, now everything is possible, he forgave him for taking his wife's soul.
Lucian forgave nothing. Some @sshole summoner forced him into the same lane as his mortal enemy. ;)
Yeah, but now thresh has extra wifesteal.
Then TSM got Boned by C9 :(
But it was so satisfying to watch! The crowd's silence at the end--that conspicuous lack of "TSM!" chants--was just delicious.
You are scaring me.....
It's the little stuff that counts. Js.
Eh, all he did was flash-flay. The box was extremely unhelpful. I'm sure the flay helped, but meh. It's only a "big play" because it was a penta.
The Box Stopped Jax from Diving onto their Back lines the Box was very useful

Someone from TSM gets featured: Aw man they were lucky, the other team set themselves up. 
Someone from another team gets featured: OMG WHAT A GOOD PLAY, ____ IS GOD.
that just summarized what TSM fans do when other teams gets featured lol
Bjerg was probably yelling at oddone to give him dat penta XD
"Its mine its mine its mine ITS MINEEEEEE"
